resources.string: " Grain: (Grains), roots and tubers (all cereals such as rice, wheat, bread, noodles, porridge which are made from grain, roots and tubers like potato, white yam, sweet potato)"
Dal: Pulses and lentils (Any food made from Dal of all kind, beans, peas, and lentils)
" Milk related: (excluding motherâ€™s milk)- Animal milk, Yogurt, Paneer, Cheese, Curd, Infant formula, canned/ powdered milk"
Flesh food: Meat, fish, chicken, Liver, Kidney or any organ meat, beef, pork, lamb, sea food
Vit-A rich fruits and vegetables: Pumpkin, carrots, squash or sweet potatoes that are yellow or orange inside, any dark green vegetables, ripe mangos, ripe papaya, musk melon
